body_html: I think this is correct. If we look in the paper https://arxiv.org/pdf/1412.6980.pdf at the bottom of section 2 (Algorithm), it says "the efficiency of algorithm 1 can, at the expense of clarity, be improved..." and lists an update like what we are doing, no?
body_text: I think this is correct. If we look in the paper https://arxiv.org/pdf/1412.6980.pdf at the bottom of section 2 (Algorithm), it says "the efficiency of algorithm 1 can, at the expense of clarity, be improved..." and lists an update like what we are doing, no?
body:
I think this is correct. If we look in the paper https://arxiv.org/pdf/1412.6980.pdf at the bottom of section 2 (Algorithm), it says "the efficiency of algorithm 1 can, at the expense of clarity, be improved..." and lists an update like what we are doing, no?
